GV05kathop_u:1: uśan ha vai vājaśravasaḥ sarvavedasaṃ dadau /
GV05kathop_u:2: tasya ha naciketā nāma putra āsa // KaU_1.1 //
GV05kathop_u:3: taṃ ha kumāraṃ santaṃ dakṣiṇāsu nīyamānāsu śraddhāviveśa /
GV05kathop_u:6: anandā nāma te lokās tān sa gacchati tā dadat // KaU_1.3 //
GV05kathop_u:7: sa hovāca pitaraṃ tata kasmai māṃ dāsyasīti /
GV05kathop_u:9: taṃ hovāca mṛtyave tvā dadāmīti // KaU_1.4 //
GV05kathop_u:10: bahūnām emi prathamo bahūnām emi madhyamaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:11: kiṃ svid yamasya kartavyaṃ yan mayādya kariṣyati // KaU_1.5 //
GV05kathop_u:13: sasyam iva martyaḥ pacyate sasyam ivājāyate punaḥ // KaU_1.6 //
GV05kathop_u:15: tasyaitāṃ śāntiṃ kurvanti hara vaivasvatodakam // KaU_1.7 //
GV05kathop_u:16: āśāpratīkṣe saṃgataṃ sūnṛtāṃ ca iṣṭāpūrte putrapaśūṃś ca sarvān /
GV05kathop_u:17: etad vṛṅkte puruṣasyālpamedhaso yasyānaśnan vasati brāhmaṇo gṛhe // KaU_1.8 //
GV05kathop_u:18: tisro rātrīr yad avatsīr gṛhe me anaśnan brahmann atithir namasyaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:19: namas te 'stu brahman svasti me 'stu tasmāt prati trīn varān vṛṇīṣva // KaU_1.9 //
GV05kathop_u:20: śāntasaṅkalpaḥ sumanā yathā syād vītamanyur gautamo mābhi mṛtyo /
GV05kathop_u:21: tvatprasṛṣṭaṃ mābhivadet pratīta etat trayāṇāṃ prathamaṃ varaṃ vṛṇe // KaU_1.10 //
GV05kathop_u:22: yathā purastād bhavitā pratīta auddālakir āruṇir matprasṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:23: sukhaṃ rātrīḥ śayitā vītamanyus tvāṃ dadṛśivān mṛtyumukhāt pramuktam // KaU_1.11 //
GV05kathop_u:24: svarge loke na bhayaṃ kiṃcanāsti na tatra tvaṃ na jarayā bibheti /
GV05kathop_u:25: ubhe tīrtvā aśanāyāpipāse śokātigo modate svargaloke // KaU_1.12 //
GV05kathop_u:26: sa tvam agniṃ svargyam adhyeṣi mṛtyo prabrūhi taṃ śraddadhānāya mahyam /
GV05kathop_u:27: svargalokā amṛtatvaṃ bhajanta etad dvitīyena vṛṇe vareṇa // KaU_1.13 //
GV05kathop_u:28: pra te bravīmi tad u me nibodha svargyam agniṃ naciketaḥ prajānan /
GV05kathop_u:29: anantalokāptim atho pratiṣṭhāṃ viddhi tvam etaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyām // KaU_1.14 //
GV05kathop_u:30: lokādim agniṃ tam uvāca tasmai yā iṣṭakā yāvatīr vā yathā vā /
GV05kathop_u:31: sa cāpi tat pratyavadad yathoktam athāsya mṛtyuḥ punar āha tuṣṭaḥ // KaU_1.15 //
GV05kathop_u:32: tam abravīt prīyamāṇo mahātmā varaṃ tavehādya dadāmi bhūyaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:33: tavaiva nāmnā bhavitāyam agniḥ sṛṅkāṃ cemām anekarūpāṃ gṛhāṇa // KaU_1.16 //
GV05kathop_u:34: triṇāciketas tribhir etya sandhiṃ trikarmakṛt tarati janmamṛtyū /
GV05kathop_u:35: brahmajajñaṃ devam īḍyaṃ viditvā nicāyyemāṃ śāntim atyantam eti // KaU_1.17 //
GV05kathop_u:36: triṇāciketas trayam etad viditvā ya evaṃ vidvāṃś cinute nāciketam /
GV05kathop_u:37: sa mṛtyupāśān purataḥ praṇodya śokātigo modate svargaloke // KaU_1.18 //
GV05kathop_u:38: eṣa te 'gnir naciketaḥ svargyo yam avṛṇīthā dvitīyena vareṇa /
GV05kathop_u:39: etam agniṃ tavaiva pravakṣyanti janāsas tṛtīyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva // KaU_1.19 //
GV05kathop_u:40: yeyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye astīty eke nāyam astīti caike /
GV05kathop_u:41: etad vidyām anuśiṣṭas tvayāhaṃ varāṇām eṣa varas tṛtīyaḥ // KaU_1.20 //
GV05kathop_u:42: devair atrāpi vicikitsitaṃ purā na hi sujñeyam aṇur eṣa dharmaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:43: anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva mā moparotsīr ati mā sṛjainam // KaU_1.21 //
GV05kathop_u:44: devair atrāpi vicikitsitaṃ kila tvaṃ ca mṛtyo yan na sujñeyam āttha /
GV05kathop_u:45: vaktā cāsya tvādṛg anyo na labhyo nānyo varas tulya etasya kaścit // KaU_1.22 //
GV05kathop_u:46: śatāyuṣaḥ putrapautrān vṛṇīṣva bahūn paśūn hastihiraṇyam aśvān /
GV05kathop_u:47: bhūmer mahad āyatanaṃ vṛṇīṣva svayaṃ ca jīva śarado yāvad icchasi // KaU_1.23 //
GV05kathop_u:48: etat tulyaṃ yadi manyase varaṃ vṛṇīṣva vittaṃ cirajīvikāṃ ca /
GV05kathop_u:49: mahābhūmau naciketas tvam edhi kāmānāṃ tvā kāmabhājaṃ karomi // KaU_1.24 //
GV05kathop_u:50: ye ye kāmā durlabhā martyaloke sarvān kāmāṃś chandataḥ prārthayasva /
GV05kathop_u:51: imā rāmāḥ sarathāḥ satūryā na hīdṛśā lambhanīyā manuṣyaiḥ /
GV05kathop_u:52: ābhir matprattābhiḥ paricārayasva naciketo maraṇaṃ mānuprākṣīḥ // KaU_1.25 //
GV05kathop_u:53: śvobhāvā martyasya yad antakaitat sarvendriyāṇāṃ jarayanti tejaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:54: api sarvaṃ jīvitam alpam eva tavaiva vāhās tava nṛtyagīte // KaU_1.26 //
GV05kathop_u:55: na vittena tarpaṇīyo manuṣyo lapsyāmahe vittam adrākṣma cet tvā /
GV05kathop_u:56: jīviṣyāmo yāvad īśiṣyasi tvaṃ varas tu me varaṇīyaḥ sa eva // KaU_1.27 //
GV05kathop_u:57: ajīryatām amṛtānām upetya jīryan martyaḥ kvadhaḥsthaḥ prajānan /
GV05kathop_u:58: abhidhyāyan varṇaratipramodān atidīrghe jīvite ko rameta // KaU_1.28 //
GV05kathop_u:59: yasminn idaṃ vicikitsanti mṛtyo yat sāmparāye mahati brūhi nas tat /
GV05kathop_u:60: yo 'yaṃ varo gūḍham anupraviṣṭo nānyaṃ tasmān naciketā vṛṇīte // KaU_1.29 //
GV05kathop_u:62: anyac chreyo 'nyad utaiva preyas te ubhe nānārthe puruṣaṃ sinītaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:63: tayoḥ śreya ādadānasya sādhu bhavati hīyate 'rthād ya u preyo vṛṇīte // KaU_2.1 //
GV05kathop_u:64: śreyaś ca preyaś ca manuṣyam etas tau saṃparītya vivinakti dhīraḥ /
GV05kathop_u:65: śreyo hi dhīro 'bhi preyaso vṛṇīte preyo mando yogakṣemād vṛṇīte // KaU_2.2 //
GV05kathop_u:66: sa tvaṃ priyān priyarūpāṃś ca kāmān abhidhyāyan naciketo 'tyasrākṣīḥ /
GV05kathop_u:67: naitāṃ sṛṅkāṃ vittamayīm avāpto yasyāṃ majjanti bahavo manuṣyāḥ // KaU_2.3 //
GV05kathop_u:68: dūram ete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyeti jñātā /
GV05kathop_u:69: vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta // KaU_2.4 //
GV05kathop_u:70: avidyāyām antare vartamānāḥ svayaṃ dhīrāḥ paṇḍitaṃ manyamānāḥ /
GV05kathop_u:71: dandramyamāṇāḥ pariyanti mūḍhā andhenaiva nīyamānā yathāndhāḥ // KaU_2.5 //
GV05kathop_u:72: na sāmparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham /
GV05kathop_u:73: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punar vaśam āpadyate me // KaU_2.6 //
GV05kathop_u:74: śravaṇāyāpi bahubhir yo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /
GV05kathop_u:75: āścaryo vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhā āścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ // KaU_2.7 //
GV05kathop_u:76: na nareṇāvareṇa prokta eṣa suvijñeyo bahudhā cintyamānaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:77: ananyaprokte gatir atra nāsty aṇīyān hy atarkyam aṇupramāṇāt // KaU_2.8 //
GV05kathop_u:78: naiṣā tarkeṇa matir āpaneyā proktānyenaiva sujñānāya preṣṭha /
GV05kathop_u:79: yāṃ tvam āpaḥ satyadhṛtir batāsi tvādṛṅ no bhūyān naciketaḥ preṣṭā // KaU_2.9 //
GV05kathop_u:80: jānāmy ahaṃ śevadhir ity anityaṃ na hy adhruvaiḥ prāpyate hi dhruvaṃ tat /
GV05kathop_u:81: tato mayā nāciketaś cito 'gnir anityair dravyaiḥ prāptavān asmi nityam // KaU_2.10 //
GV05kathop_u:82: kāmasya āptiṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ krator anantyam abhayasya pāram /
GV05kathop_u:83: stomamahad urugāyaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛtyā dhīro naciketo 'tyasrākṣīḥ // KaU_2.11 //
GV05kathop_u:84: taṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍham anupraviṣṭaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam /
GV05kathop_u:85: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti // KaU_2.12 //
GV05kathop_u:86: etac chrutvā saṃparigṛhya martyaḥ pravṛhya dharmyam aṇum etam āpya /
GV05kathop_u:87: sa modate modanīyaṃ hi labdhvā vivṛtaṃ sadma naciketasaṃ manye // KaU_2.13 //
GV05kathop_u:89: anyatra bhūtāc ca bhavyāc ca yat tat paśyasi tad vada // KaU_2.14 //
GV05kathop_u:90: sarve vedā yat padam āmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yad vadanti /
GV05kathop_u:91: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmi //
GV05kathop_u:93: etad dhy evākṣaraṃ brahma etad dhy evākṣaraṃ param /
GV05kathop_u:94: etad dhy evākṣaraṃ jñātvā yo yad icchati tasya tat // KaU_2.16 //
GV05kathop_u:95: etad ālambanaṃ śreṣṭham etad ālambanaṃ param /
GV05kathop_u:96: etad ālambanaṃ jñātvā brahmaloke mahīyate // KaU_2.17 //
GV05kathop_u:97: na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścin nāyaṃ kutaścin na babhūva kaścit /
GV05kathop_u:98: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre // KaU_2.18 //
GV05kathop_u:99: hantā cen manyate hantuṃ hataś cen manyate hatam /
GV05kathop_u:100: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate // KaU_2.19 //
GV05kathop_u:101: aṇor aṇīyān mahato mahīyān ātmāsya jantor nihito guhāyām /
GV05kathop_u:102: tam akratuḥ paśyati vītaśoko dhātuprasādān mahimānam ātmanaḥ // KaU_2.20 //
GV05kathop_u:103: āsīno dūraṃ vrajati śayāno yāti sarvataḥ /
GV05kathop_u:104: kas taṃ madāmadaṃ devaṃ mad anyo jñātum arhati // KaU_2.21 //
GV05kathop_u:106: mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // KaU_2.22 //
GV05kathop_u:107: nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena /
GV05kathop_u:108: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām // KaU_2.23 //
GV05kathop_u:111: yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca ubhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:112: mṛtyur yasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ // KaU_2.25 //
GV05kathop_u:114: ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GV05kathop_u:115: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ // KaU_3.1 //
GV05kathop_u:116: yaḥ setur ījānānām akṣaraṃ brahma yat param /
GV05kathop_u:117: abhayaṃ titīrṣatāṃ pāraṃ nāciketaṃ śakemahi // KaU_3.2 //
GV05kathop_u:118: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ ratham eva tu /
GV05kathop_u:119: buddhiṃ tu sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragraham eva ca // KaU_3.3 //
GV05kathop_u:120: indriyāṇi hayān āhur viṣayāṃs teṣu gocarān /
GV05kathop_u:122: yas tv avijñānavān bhavaty ayuktena manasā sadā /
GV05kathop_u:123: tasyendriyāṇy avaśyāni duṣṭāśvā iva sāratheḥ // KaU_3.5 //
GV05kathop_u:124: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati yuktena manasā sadā /
GV05kathop_u:125: tasyendriyāṇi vaśyāni sadaśvā iva sāratheḥ // KaU_3.6 //
GV05kathop_u:126: yas tv avijñānavān bhavaty amanaskaḥ sadāśuciḥ /
GV05kathop_u:127: na sa tat padam āpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati // KaU_3.7 //
GV05kathop_u:128: yas tu vijñānavān bhavati samanaskaḥ sadā śuciḥ /
GV05kathop_u:129: sa tu tat padam āpnoti yasmād bhūyo na jāyate // KaU_3.8 //
GV05kathop_u:130: vijñānasārathir yas tu manaḥ pragrahavān naraḥ /
GV05kathop_u:131: so 'dhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // KaU_3.9 //
GV05kathop_u:132: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaś ca paraṃ manaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:133: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ // KaU_3.10 //
GV05kathop_u:134: mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ /
GV05kathop_u:135: puruśān na paraṃ kiṃcit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ // KaU_3.11 //
GV05kathop_u:136: eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho 'tmā na prakāśate /
GV05kathop_u:137: dṛṣyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā sūkṣmadarśibhiḥ // KaU_3.12 //
GV05kathop_u:138: yacched vāṅmanasī prājñas tad yacchej jñāna ātmani /
GV05kathop_u:139: jñānam ātmani mahati niyacchet tad yacchec chānta ātmani // KaU_3.13 //
GV05kathop_u:141: kṣurasya dhārā niśitā duratyayā durgaṃ pathas tat kavayo vadanti // KaU_3.14 //
GV05kathop_u:142: aśabdam asparśam arūpam avyayaṃ tathārasaṃ nityam agandhavac ca yat /
GV05kathop_u:143: anādy anantaṃ mahataḥ paraṃ dhruvaṃ nicāyya tan mṛtyumukhāt pramucyate // KaU_3.15 //
GV05kathop_u:145: uktvā śrutvā ca medhāvī brahmaloke mahīyate // KaU_3.16 //
GV05kathop_u:146: ya imaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ śrāvayed brahmasaṃsadi /
GV05kathop_u:147: prayataḥ śrāddhakāle vā tad ānantyāya kalpate /
GV05kathop_u:150: parāñci khāni vyatṛṇat svayaṃbhūs tasmāt parāṅ paśyati nāntarātman /
GV05kathop_u:151: kaścid dhīraḥ pratyag ātmānam aikṣad āvṛttacakṣur amṛtatvam icchan // KaU_4.1 //
GV05kathop_u:152: parācaḥ kāmān anuyanti bālās te mṛtyor yanti vitatasya pāśam /
GV05kathop_u:153: atha dhīrā amṛtatvaṃ viditvā dhruvam adhruveṣv iha na prārthayante // KaU_4.2 //
GV05kathop_u:154: yena rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ śabdān sparśīṃś ca maithunān /
GV05kathop_u:158: mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // KaU_4.4 //
GV05kathop_u:159: ya imaṃ madhvadaṃ veda ātmānaṃ jīvam antikāt /
GV05kathop_u:162: yaḥ pūrvaṃ tapaso jātam adbhyaḥ pūrvam ajāyata /
GV05kathop_u:163: guhāṃ praviśya tiṣṭhantaṃ yo bhūtebhir vyapaśyata //
GV05kathop_u:166: guhāṃ praviśya tiṣṭhantīṃ yā bhūtebhir vyajāyata //
GV05kathop_u:168: araṇyor nihito jātavedā garbha iva subhṛto garbhiṇībhiḥ /
GV05kathop_u:169: divediva īḍyo jāgṛvadbhir haviṣmadbhir manuṣyebhir agniḥ //
GV05kathop_u:171: yataś codeti sūryo astaṃ yatra ca gacchati /
GV05kathop_u:172: taṃ devāḥ sarve arpitās tad u nātyeti kaścana //
GV05kathop_u:174: yad eveha tad amutra yad amutra tad anv iha /
GV05kathop_u:175: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati // KaU_4.10 //
GV05kathop_u:177: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyuṃ gacchati ya iha nāneva paśyati // KaU_4.11 //
GV05kathop_u:182: īśāno bhūtabhavyasya sa evādya sa u śvaḥ //
GV05kathop_u:185: evaṃ dharmān pṛthak paśyaṃs tān evānu vidhāvati // KaU_4.14 //
GV05kathop_u:186: yathodakaṃ śuddhe śuddham āsiktaṃ tādṛg eva bhavati /
GV05kathop_u:187: evaṃ muner vijānata ātmā bhavati gautama // KaU_4.15 //
GV05kathop_u:190: anuṣṭhāya na śocati vimuktaś ca vimucyate //
GV05kathop_u:192: haṃsaḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir duroṇasat /
GV05kathop_u:193: nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtaṃ bṛhat // KaU_5.2 //
GV05kathop_u:194: ūrdhvaṃ prāṇam unnayati apānaṃ pratyag asyati /
GV05kathop_u:195: madhye vāmanam āsīnaṃ viśve devā upāsate // KaU_5.3 //
GV05kathop_u:199: na prāṇena nāpānena martyo jīvati kaścana /
GV05kathop_u:200: itareṇa tu jīvanti yasminn etāv upāśritau // KaU_5.5 //
GV05kathop_u:201: hanta ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam /
GV05kathop_u:202: yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya ātmā bhavati gautama // KaU_5.6 //
GV05kathop_u:205: ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:206: tad eva śukraṃ tad brahma tad evāmṛtam ucyate /
GV05kathop_u:207: tasmiṃl lokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tad u nātyeti kaścana //
GV05kathop_u:209: agnir yathaiko bhuvanaṃ praviṣṭo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva /
GV05kathop_u:210: ekas tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo bahiś ca // KaU_5.9 //
GV05kathop_u:211: vāyur yathaiko bhuvanaṃ praviṣṭo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva /
GV05kathop_u:212: ekas tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo bahiś ca // KaU_5.10 //
GV05kathop_u:213: sūryo yathā sarvalokasya cakṣur na lipyate cākṣuṣair bāhyadoṣaiḥ /
GV05kathop_u:214: ekas tathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ // KaU_5.11 //
GV05kathop_u:215: eko vaśī sarvabhūtāntarātmā ekaṃ rūpaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti /
GV05kathop_u:216: tam ātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ sukhaṃ śāśvataṃ netareṣām // KaU_5.12 //
GV05kathop_u:217: nityo 'nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān /
GV05kathop_u:218: tam ātmasthaṃ ye 'nupaśyanti dhīrās teṣaṃ śāntiḥ śāśvatī netareṣām // KaU_5.13 //
GV05kathop_u:219: tad etad iti manyante 'nirdeśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham /
GV05kathop_u:220: kathaṃ nu tad vijānīyāṃ kim u bhāti vibhāti vā // KaU_5.14 //
GV05kathop_u:221: na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kuto 'yam agniḥ /
GV05kathop_u:222: tam eva bhāntam anu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti // KaU_5.15 //
GV05kathop_u:225: tad eva śukraṃ tad brahma tad evāmṛtam ucyate /
GV05kathop_u:226: tasmiṃl lokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tad u nātyeti kaścana //
GV05kathop_u:228: yad idaṃ kiṃca jagat sarvaṃ prāṇa ejati niḥsṛtam /
GV05kathop_u:229: mahad bhayaṃ vajram udyataṃ ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti // KaU_6.2 //
GV05kathop_u:230: bhayād asyāgnis tapati bhayāt tapati sūryaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:231: bhayād indraś ca vāyuś ca mṛtyur dhāvati pañcamaḥ // KaU_6.3 //
GV05kathop_u:232: iha ced aśakad boddhuṃ prākśarīrasya visrasaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:233: tataḥ sargeṣu lokeṣu śarīratvāya kalpate // KaU_6.4 //
GV05kathop_u:234: yathādarśe tathātmani yathā svapne tathā pitṛloke /
GV05kathop_u:235: yathāpsu parīva dadṛśe tathā gandharvaloke chāyātapayor iva brahmaloke // KaU_6.5 //
GV05kathop_u:237: pṛthag utpadyamānānāṃ matvā dhīro na śocati // KaU_6.6 //
GV05kathop_u:238: indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ mano manasaḥ sattvam uttamam /
GV05kathop_u:239: sattvād adhi mahānātmā mahato 'vyaktam uttamam // KaU_6.7 //
GV05kathop_u:240: avyaktāt tu paraḥ puruṣo vyāpako 'liṅga eva ca /
GV05kathop_u:241: yaṃ jñātvā mucyate jantur amṛtatvaṃ ca gacchati // KaU_6.8 //
GV05kathop_u:242: na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
GV05kathop_u:243: hṛdā manīṣā manasābhikḷpto ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti // KaU_6.9 //
GV05kathop_u:245: buddhiś ca na viceṣṭati tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim // KaU_6.10 //
GV05kathop_u:246: tāṃ yogam iti manyante sthirām indriyadhāraṇām /
GV05kathop_u:247: apramattas tadā bhavati yogo hi prabhavāpyayau // KaU_6.11 //
GV05kathop_u:248: naiva vācā na manasā prāptuṃ śakyo na cakṣuṣā /
GV05kathop_u:249: astīti bruvato 'nyatra kathaṃ tad upalabhyate // KaU_6.12 //
GV05kathop_u:252: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GV05kathop_u:253: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute // KaU_6.14 //
GV05kathop_u:255: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty etāvad dhy anuśāsanam // KaU_6.15 //
GV05kathop_u:256: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GV05kathop_u:257: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavati // KaU_6.16 //
GV05kathop_u:258: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo 'ntarātmā sadā janānāṃ hṛdaye saṃniviṣṭaḥ /
GV05kathop_u:259: taṃ svāc charīrāt pravṛhen muñjād iveṣīkāṃ dhairyeṇa /
GV05kathop_u:260: taṃ vidyāc chukram amṛtaṃ taṃ vidyāc chukram amṛtam iti // KaU_6.17 //
GV05kathop_u:261: mṛtyuproktāṃ naciketo 'tha labdhvā vidyām etāṃ yogavidhiṃ ca kṛtsnam /
GV05kathop_u:262: brahmaprāpto virajo 'bhūd vimṛtyur anyo 'py evaṃ yo vid adhyātmam eva // KaU_6.18 //
